entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.9Â°C

Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 6:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
